resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108372</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108372</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206348</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Lemelson Center</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lemelson Mitte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Centre de Lemelson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Centro De Lemelson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Centro Di Lemelson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κέντρο Lemelson</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Centro De Lemelson</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores the exciting world of invention. It features virtual exhibits and in-depth explorations of the electric guitar, the Quartz watch, the light bulb, and other inventions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht die aufregende Welt der Erfindung. 
Sie kennzeichnet virtuelle Ausstellungen und eingehende 
Erforschungen der elektrischen Guitarre, der Quarzuhr, der Glühlampe 
und anderer Erfindungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore le monde passionnant de l'invention. 
Elle comporte les objets exposés virtuels et les explorations 
détaillées de la guitare électrique, de la montre de quartz, de 
l'ampoule, et d'autres inventions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora o mundo emocionante da invenção. 
Caracteriza exibições virtuais e explorações in-depth da 
guitarra elétrica, do relógio de quartzo, do bulbo claro, e de 
outras invenções.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora il mondo emozionante dell'invenzione. 
Caratterizza le esposizioni virtuali e le esplorazioni 
approfondite del guitar elettrico, della vigilanza del quarzo, della 
lampadina e di altre invenzioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξερευνά τον κόσμο διέγερσης της εφεύρεσης. 
Χαρακτηρίζει τα εικονικά εκθέματα και τις σε βάθος 
εξερευνήσεις της ηλεκτρικής κιθάρας, του ρολογιού χαλαζία, του 
ελαφριού βολβού, και άλλων εφευρέσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora el mundo emocionante de la invención. 
Ofrece objetos expuestos virtuales y exploraciones profundizadas
de la guitarra eléctrica, del reloj del cuarzo, de la bombilla, y de 
otras invenciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206348</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108372</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-lemelson-center</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
